Questions.Question: Which artist collaborated with Jay-Z on the album 'Watch the Throne'?
Questions.Explanation: Kanye West collaborated with Jay-Z on the album 'Watch the Throne' released in 2011.

Questions.Question: Who collaborated with Frida Kahlo on the painting 'The Two Fridas'?
Questions.Explanation: Frida Kahlo collaborated with herself on the painting 'The Two Fridas' in 1939.

Questions.Question: Which artist collaborated with Andy Warhol on the 'Factory' art studio?
Questions.Explanation: Jean-Michel Basquiat collaborated with Andy Warhol at the 'Factory' art studio in the 1980s.

Questions.Question: Who collaborated with Leonardo da Vinci on the painting 'The Last Supper'?
Questions.Explanation: Leonardo da Vinci worked alone on the painting 'The Last Supper' between 1495 and 1498.

Questions.Question: Which artist collaborated with Lady Gaga on the song 'Shallow'?
Questions.Explanation: Bradley Cooper collaborated with Lady Gaga on the song 'Shallow' for the movie 'A Star is Born'.

Questions.Question: Who collaborated with Salvador Dali on the painting 'The Persistence of Memory'?
Questions.Explanation: Salvador Dali worked alone on the painting 'The Persistence of Memory' in 1931.

Questions.Question: Which artist collaborated with Beyoncé on the song 'Crazy in Love'?
Questions.Explanation: Jay-Z collaborated with Beyoncé on the song 'Crazy in Love' released in 2003.

Questions.Question: Who collaborated with Vincent van Gogh on the painting 'The Yellow House'?
Questions.Explanation: Paul Gauguin collaborated with Vincent van Gogh on the painting 'The Yellow House' in 1888.

Questions.Question: Which artist collaborated with Frida Kahlo on the painting 'The Love Embrace of the Universe'?
Questions.Explanation: Frida Kahlo collaborated with herself on the painting 'The Love Embrace of the Universe' in 1949.

Questions.Question: Who collaborated with Keith Haring on the 'Crack is Wack' mural?
Questions.Explanation: Keith Haring worked alone on the 'Crack is Wack' mural in 1986.

Questions.Question: Which artist collaborated with Jean-Michel Basquiat on the painting 'Olympic Rings'?
Questions.Explanation: Andy Warhol collaborated with Jean-Michel Basquiat on the painting 'Olympic Rings' in 1985.

Questions.Question: Who collaborated with Pablo Picasso on the painting 'Les Demoiselles d'Avignon'?
Questions.Explanation: Georges Braque did not collaborate with Pablo Picasso on the painting 'Les Demoiselles d'Avignon'. Picasso worked alone on it in 1907.

Questions.Question: Which artist collaborated with Jackson Pollock on the painting 'No. 5, 1948'?
Questions.Explanation: Jackson Pollock worked alone on the painting 'No. 5, 1948' in 1948.

Questions.Question: Who collaborated with Claude Monet on the painting 'Water Lilies'?
Questions.Explanation: Claude Monet worked alone on the painting series 'Water Lilies' between 1899 and 1926.

Questions.Question: Which artist collaborated with René Magritte on the painting 'The Son of Man'?
Questions.Explanation: René Magritte worked alone on the painting 'The Son of Man' in 1964.

Questions.Question: Who collaborated with Frida Kahlo on the painting 'The Broken Column'?
Questions.Explanation: Frida Kahlo worked alone on the painting 'The Broken Column' in 1944.

Questions.Question: Which artist collaborated with Keith Haring on the 'Pop Shop'?
Questions.Explanation: Keith Haring opened the 'Pop Shop' as a retail store for his own artwork in 1986.

Questions.Question: Who collaborated with Salvador Dali on the painting 'The Elephants'?
Questions.Explanation: Salvador Dali worked alone on the painting 'The Elephants' in 1948.

Questions.Question: Which artist collaborated with Beyoncé on the song 'Drunk in Love'?
Questions.Explanation: Jay-Z collaborated with Beyoncé on the song 'Drunk in Love' released in 2013.

Questions.Question: Who collaborated with Vincent van Gogh on the painting 'Starry Night'?
Questions.Explanation: Vincent van Gogh worked alone on the painting 'Starry Night' in 1889.
